document.full_text: the united nations called on thursday for "bold and decisive steps" to relaunch the israeli-palestinian peace process as the region awaits a possible new initiative by u.s. president barack obama.
document.title: u.n. urges bold steps to relaunch mideast peace
lines_and_colors: the united nations called on thursday for "bold and decisive steps" to relaunch the israeli-palestinian peace process as the region awaits a possible new initiative by u.s. president barack obama.
